description: Verify that the Sign Up page loads correctly when accessing the /auth/signup URL
scenario: New user navigates to the signup page to create a Phalanx Cyber Academy account
expected_results: Display the complete signup page with email-only form, cybersecurity theme, and proper initialization
procedure:
1. Open web browser
2. Navigate to http://localhost:5000/auth/signup
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check page title displays 'Join Phalanx Cyber Academy'
5. Verify email input form is visible and properly styled
6. Check timezone detection script initializes correctly
7. Verify sign-up.js is loaded for potential validation enhancements
8. Check animated background elements are present

description: Verify email submission and validation for passwordless authentication
scenario: User enters email address to initiate passwordless signup process
expected_results: Email is validated, 6-digit verification code is sent, and user is redirected to verification page
procedure:
1. Navigate to /auth/signup page
2. Verify 'Email Address' field is present with envelope icon
3. Enter invalid email format and check HTML5 validation
4. Enter valid email address
5. Verify timezone is automatically detected and populated in hidden field
6. Submit the form
7. Check form submission processing
8. Verify 6-digit verification code is generated and sent to email
9. Confirm redirect to email verification page
10. Verify email verification record is created in database with 10-minute expiration

description: Verify signup page is responsive across different screen sizes
scenario: User accesses signup page on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices
expected_results: Page adapts properly to different screen sizes with email form remaining accessible
procedure:
1. Navigate to /auth/signup page on desktop (1920x1080)
2. Verify max-width constraint (max-w-md) works properly
3. Resize browser to tablet size (768px width)
4. Check form scaling and button layout
5. Resize to mobile size (375px width)
6. Verify email form remains usable on mobile
7. Test touch interactions for form submission
8. Check button sizes meet touch target guidelines (min 44x44px)
9. Verify animated background elements scale appropriately
10. Test landscape and portrait orientations on mobile

description: Verify signup page performance and integration with passwordless authentication system
scenario: User completes signup process with optimal performance and proper system integration
expected_results: Fast loading times, smooth interactions, and seamless integration with email verification system
procedure:
1. Clear browser cache and navigate to /auth/signup page
2. Record page load time and performance metrics
3. Verify total load time is under 3 seconds
4. Test JavaScript component initialization time
5. Check timezone detection performance
6. Verify form submission response time
7. Test integration with email verification system (6-digit code generation)
8. Check database transaction performance for email_verifications table
9. Verify redirect to verification page is immediate
10. Test overall passwordless flow timing (signup → verify → onboarding)
11. Check memory usage and cleanup
12. Verify no console errors or warnings

description: Verify signup page theme switching and dark mode compatibility
scenario: User accesses signup page with different theme preferences
expected_results: Page displays correctly in both light and dark modes with proper contrast and styling
procedure:
1. Navigate to /auth/signup in light mode
2. Verify gradient backgrounds use light theme colors
3. Check email input field has proper light theme styling
4. Switch to dark mode using system preference or toggle
5. Verify gradient backgrounds transition to dark theme colors
6. Check email input field has dark theme styling with sufficient contrast
7. Test animated background elements in dark mode
8. Verify button hover states work in both themes
9. Check text readability in both modes
10. Test transition animations between themes

description: Verify automatic timezone detection and submission
scenario: User's timezone is automatically detected and included in signup data
expected_results: Timezone is correctly detected using Intl.DateTimeFormat and submitted with form
procedure:
1. Navigate to /auth/signup page
2. Open browser console
3. Check timezone hidden input field is populated
4. Verify timezone value matches system timezone (e.g., 'America/New_York')
5. Test with different timezone settings
6. Verify fallback to 'UTC' if detection fails
7. Submit form and check timezone is sent to backend
8. Verify timezone is stored with user account
9. Test error handling for timezone detection failures
